page.title:
IS THERE A PROBLEM WITH BE FOR HVD/P? - BIOEQUIVALENT WITH ITSELF?
IS THERE A PROBLEM WITH BE
FOR HVD/P?
- BIOEQUIVALENT WITH ITSELF?
page.normal_text:
Administer the same HVD formulation twice: - generally can not demonstrate BE
Administer the same HVD formulation twice:
- generally can not demonstrate BE

Example: oral administration, on two occasions, of IsoptinSR 240 mg tablets
Example: oral administration, on two
occasions, of IsoptinSR 240 mg tablets
